data.title: University of Houston Athletics
data.meta_description: Owen Woodward (38) Right-handed Pitcher - AWARDS 2023 American All-Academic Team SENIOR (2024) Pitched 4.1 perfect innings in his first start of the year aga...
data.text:
AWARDS

2023 American All-Academic Team

SENIOR (2024)

Pitched 4.1 perfect innings in his first start of the year against Texas (4/12).

Struck out a career-high 10 Texas hitters while allowing just one hit in his first start (4/12).

Struck out multiple hitters in all 10 appearances.

Tied for fifth on the team with 36 strikeouts.

Averaged 13.9 strikeouts per nine innings pitched.

Tied for the team-lead with just four walks allowed.

JUNIOR (2023)

Second on the team in games finished (9) and saves (4)

Made 25 appearances with one start

Finished with a 4-0 record and four saves over 42.0 innings and 51 strikeouts

Made Cougar debut on Opening Day against Cal throwing 1.0 innings with two strikeouts (2/17)

Earned first save against UTRGV throwing 0.2 innings with one strikeout (3/3)

Pitched 2.1 innings with five strikeouts against Northwestern (3/25)

Against USF, pitched 5.0 innings allowing only one run with four strikeouts (4/14)

Tossed a career-high seven strikeouts in a 4.2 shutout performance against Memphis (5/26)

PRIOR TO UH

Spent 2022 season at Weatherford College

Appeared in 12 games

Led team with 4 saves

Pitched a total of 20.1 innings

Had 30 strikeouts compared to 8 walks

Holds an ERA of 3.10

Helped lead the team to a record of 38-21

HIGH SCHOOL

Prepped at Breckenridge High School

Texasâ€™ No. 188 RHP (Perfect Game)

Letterman in football, basketball, golf and track

PERSONAL

Full name is Owen Woodward

Son of Brad and Carey

Has two siblings Lily and Hudson

Interested in studying business
